thread.title: BRIEF-UBM ‍Says In Discussions With Informa Regarding Potential Combination Of Two Companies​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-UBM ‍Says In Discussions With Informa Regarding Potential Combination Of Two Companies​
text:
Jan 16 (Reuters) - UBM Plc:
* ‍IN DISCUSSIONS REGARDING A POTENTIAL COMBINATION OF TWO COMPANIES​
* ‍UBM AND INFORMA CONFIRM THAT THEY ARE IN DISCUSSIONS REGARDING A POTENTIAL COMBINATION OF TWO COMPANIES​
* ‍UBM AND INFORMA ARE IN PRELIMINARY DISCUSSIONS ABOUT DETAILS OF POTENTIAL COMBINATION​
* ‍THERE CAN BE NO CERTAINTY THAT ANY FIRM OFFER WILL BE MADE OR AS TO TERMS ON WHICH ANY OFFER MIGHT BE MADE​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
